mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, John Augustine Washington III, Mount Vernon, to Eleanor Love Selden Washington, 1846 December 10
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, John Augustine, III, 1821-1861
mdRecord.dcterms:description: He has been trying to procure signatures for a “petition for the division of our county.” The sale of Woodlawn and the Quakers who are to settle on it. Autograph letter signed, 2 pages, with integral address panel.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Woodlawn Plantation (Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: John Augustine Washington III and Eleanor Love Selden Correspondence
